==Summary==
Brogan had read ''[[The Hobbit]]'', and inquired about the world it played in. Tolkien informed him about ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' and the unfinished ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
